title: Summer of the seventeenth doll [discussion]
brief_description: Peter Fitzpatrick from Monash University is an expert on Ray Lawler’s play. He looks at its dramatic heritage and how the play farewells the myth of the male bush hero by showing what hapens when the old values of the outback hero and urban domesticity are in conflict.
